Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Will be good idea to have more than 5 
characters and how many characters 
should be???? 

  o Yea, we should have until 7 characters 
  o Yea, we should have until 14 characters 
  o Yea, we should have unlimited mnumber of characters 
  o Yea, we should follow the old rule about characters number 
  o No, it's fine to keep until 5 characters... by now 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
